name: LegitFlix UI
overview: A complete overhaul of the Jellyfin web interface.

versions.changelog: Player: Fixed play/pause click, volume unmute, and icon visibility; Fullscreen auto-hide; Skip Intro button fix; Trickplay tile API rewrite; Timeline hover preview; Playback progress fix. Settings: Auto Skip Intro/Outro toggles; Unified Player UI; Modal scroll lock; Subtitle customization.
